TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ContentLocatorBase extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged

Docs.summary: Represents an object that identifies an item of content.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Derived from ContentLocatorBase, a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> identifies a data item through an ordered list of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> elements.
Derived from ContentLocatorBase, a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> identifies a data item through a set of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> elements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable deep copy clone of this .
Docs.returns: A modifiable deep copy clone of this .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This Clone method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects. For convenience, Clone shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. For more details, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is `true.`
When copying dependency properties, Clone copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy not animations or current animation values.
